results.title: [Are beta-blockers generally contraindicated in patients with peripheral arterial occlusive disease?].
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Arterial_Occlusive_Disease_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564658 @@@peripheral arterial occlusive disease@@@ who were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 50 mg/day demonstrated significant decreases in both @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@-free and maximal walking distance.

citations.NLM: Schweizer J, Kaulen R, Altmann E, Nierade A, Nanning T. [Are beta-blockers generally contraindicated in patients with peripheral arterial occlusive disease?]. Z Kardiol. 1996 Mar;85(3):193-7. PMID: 8659199
citations.BibTeX: @article{8659199, title={[Are beta-blockers generally contraindicated in patients with peripheral arterial occlusive disease?].}, author={Schweizer J and Kaulen R and Altmann E and Nierade A and Nanning T}, journal={Z Kardiol}, volume={85}, number={3}, pages={193-7}}

results.title: Beta-blockers and nitrates in patients with peripheral arterial occlusive disease: long-term findings.
results.text_hl: METHODS: The effect of 6 months' administration of @CHEMICAL_Celiprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017272 @@@celiprolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Isosorbide_Dinitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007548 @@@isosorbide dinitrate@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Arterial_Occlusive_Disease_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564658 @@@peripheral arterial occlusive disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Arterial_Occlusive_Disease_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564658 @@@PAOD@@@), double-blind and placebo-controlled, was investigated in 56 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with chronic @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@ischaemic heart disease@@@ and stage IIb @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Arterial_Occlusive_Disease_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564658 @@@PAOD@@@, using as criteria the walking distance and the change in resistance index in the femoral artery.

citations.NLM: Schweizer J, Kaulen R, Nierade A, Altmann E. Beta-blockers and nitrates in patients with peripheral arterial occlusive disease: long-term findings. Vasa. 1997;26(1):43-6. PMID: 9068264
citations.BibTeX: @article{9068264, title={Beta-blockers and nitrates in patients with peripheral arterial occlusive disease: long-term findings.}, author={Schweizer J and Kaulen R and Nierade A and Altmann E}, journal={Vasa}, volume={26}, number={1}, pages={43-6}}
